caption.center: Ivan GIBSON, Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Kentucky, Appellee.

opinion.posture: Appeal from Knott Circuit Court; Ben Mann, Judge.
opinion.attorneys:
John Chris Cornett, Cordell H. Martin, Hindman, for appellant.
Ed W. Hancock, Atty. Gen., Mary Ann Delaney, Asst. Atty. Gen., Frankfort, for appellee.
opinion.opinion_text:
Memorandum Opinion PER CURIAM, Affirming.[fn*]
[fn*] Opinion ordered not to be published.
